text:
Under load, .java is incorrectly generated from .jsp.
Consequently, the request is aborted due to compiler
errors.

text:
Not enught information, what JSP, what is generted, what load ?
I tried "ab -n 200 -c 10" and it worked fine ( in 3.3M1 ). 
3.1 is known to have problems, you need to upgrade at least to 3.2.
